languages.text: {n}Неравнодушные к судьбе Горнила хлынули на Фолстоун, и среди них были не только священники высокого сана, но и могущественные аристократы и другие влиятельные и набожные особы. Осознав, какими последствиями обернется дальнейшая борьба, техножрецы были вынуждены отступить.{/n}

{n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неравнодушные к судьбе Горнила хлынули на Фолстоун, и среди них были не только священники высокого сана, но и могущественные аристократы и другие влиятельные и набожные особы. Осознав, какими последствиями обернется дальнейшая борьба, техножрецы были вынуждены отступить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible flooded Foulstone. They included not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

{n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible flooded Foulstone. They included not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

{n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

{n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus Sorge um das Schicksal des Tiegels strömten die Leute in Scharen nach Foulstone. Unter ihnen waren neben hochrangigen Klerikern auch mächtige Aristokraten und andere einflussreiche Würdenträger. Als sie die zu erwartenden Konsequenzen ihres Kampfes erkannten, blieb den Techpriestern keine andere Wahl, als sich zurückzuziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Sorge um das Schicksal des Tiegels strömten die Leute in Scharen nach Foulstone. Unter ihnen waren neben hochrangigen Klerikern auch mächtige Aristokraten und andere einflussreiche Würdenträger. Als sie die zu erwartenden Konsequenzen ihres Kampfes erkannten, blieb den Techpriestern keine andere Wahl, als sich zurückzuziehen.

languages.text: {n}Pota'nın akıbeti hususunda endişelenen insanlar, kitleler hâlinde Menfurtaş'a akın etti. Aralarında sadece yüksek rütbeli din adamları değil, aynı zamanda güçlü aristokratlar ve diğer nüfuzlu ve dindar kimseler de vardı. Mücadelelerine devam etmenin olası sonuçlarını anlayan Tekno Rahiplerin geri adım atmaktan başka çaresi kalmadı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pota'nın akıbeti hususunda endişelenen insanlar, kitleler hâlinde Menfurtaş'a akın etti. Aralarında sadece yüksek rütbeli din adamları değil, aynı zamanda güçlü aristokratlar ve diğer nüfuzlu ve dindar kimseler de vardı. Mücadelelerine devam etmenin olası sonuçlarını anlayan Tekno Rahiplerin geri adım atmaktan başka çaresi kalmadı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mucha gente preocupada por el destino del Crisol acudió en tropel a Rocainmunda. Entre ellos no solo había miembros distinguidos del clero, sino también poderosos aristócratas y otros individuos influyentes y devotos. Conscientes de las posibles repercusiones si continuaban con su pugna, los tecnosacerdotes no tuvieron más remedio que recular.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mucha gente preocupada por el destino del Crisol acudió en tropel a Rocainmunda. Entre ellos no solo había miembros distinguidos del clero, sino también poderosos aristócratas y otros individuos influyentes y devotos. Conscientes de las posibles repercusiones si continuaban con su pugna, los tecnosacerdotes no tuvieron más remedio que recular.{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有关心熔炉命运的人都蜂拥到了荒寂岩地，其中不仅包括高阶神职人员，还包括权势显赫的贵族，以及其他有影响力的虔诚之人。技术神甫们意识到继续进行这场冲突恐怕会招致糟糕的后果，只得选择退让。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有关心熔炉命运的人都蜂拥到了荒寂岩地，其中不仅包括高阶神职人员，还包括权势显赫的贵族，以及其他有影响力的虔诚之人。技术神甫们意识到继续进行这场冲突恐怕会招致糟糕的后果，只得选择退让。{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'immenses foules inquiètes du sort du creuset se sont rendues à Rochepeste. Parmi ces personnes se trouvaient des religieux de haut rang, ainsi que de puissants aristocrates et autres individus aussi pieux qu'influents. Réalisant alors les conséquences que pourraient avoir leurs actes, les technoprêtres n'ont pas eu d'autre choix que de cesser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'immenses foules inquiètes du sort du creuset se sont rendues à Rochepeste. Parmi ces personnes se trouvaient des religieux de haut rang, ainsi que de puissants aristocrates et autres individus aussi pieux qu'influents. Réalisant alors les conséquences que pourraient avoir leurs actes, les technoprêtres n'ont pas eu d'autre choix que de cesser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}クルーシブルの行く末を騒ぎ立てる人間どもが、フォールストーンに群れをなして押し寄せた。聖職の上の連中だけじゃない。貴族や有力者、敬虔ぶった連中まで来た。続ければどうなるか分かって、テックプリーストどもは引き下がるしかなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}People concerned about the fate of the Crucible descended upon Foulstone in droves. Among them were not only high-ranking clerics but also powerful aristocrats and other people of influence and piety. Realising the likely consequences of continuing their struggle, the Tech-Priests had no choice but to back down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クルーシブルの行く末を騒ぎ立てる人間どもが、フォールストーンに群れをなして押し寄せた。聖職の上の連中だけじゃない。貴族や有力者、敬虔ぶった連中まで来た。続ければどうなるか分かって、テックプリーストどもは引き下がるしかなかった。{/n}
